pathAssistantSteps.info: • Validate/Add proper Contact Name and Email Address.

• Select the proper Reason for Hold
  • Read carefully the Customer's requests and call at least twice if needed
  • If unable to reach the customer over the phone, send an email.
  • While addressing customer's request to Internal Dept:
    • Remove customer from copy and send an internal request.

• Select the proper Service Trade
  • Identify customer's needs and additional business opportunities
  • Review previous requests if needed and look for any reference number
  • Attach to the email any required document
  • Reply to the latest customer's email

• Make sure all information received is complete
  • Donâ€™t hesitate to contact the sender if something is not clear
  • Make sure you replied and satisfied customer's need before closing the case
